thread.title: SAG Awards 2017: Complete Nominees and Winners List
thread.title_full: SAG Awards 2017: Complete Nominees and Winners List

title: SAG Awards 2017: Complete Nominees and Winners List
text:
SAG Awards 2017: Complete Nominees and Winners List January 29, 2017 @ 5:00 PM By Tess Kornfeld 
The absolute best of television and movie acting! As broadcast live on TBS and TNT at 8 p.m. ET, the 23rd annual 2017 Screen Actors Guild Awards were held Sunday, January 29, at the Shrine Auditorium in Los Angeles. 
Sophia Bush , Brie Larson , and the adorable cast of Stranger Things are among the selected bunch slated to hand out the solid bronze statues to their fellow actors. In a much-anticipated reunion , Jane Fonda and Dolly Parton presented their 9 to 5 costar Lily Tomlin with the Life Achievement Award. 
Check out the full list of winners below and make sure to check back throughout the show for updates as winners are announced! The SAG Awards actor statue. Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images 
Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture 
Captain Fantastic
